title: Wave Raid powered by Timed Comments
description: One of the SoundCloud APIâ€™s most powerful features is the timed comment. At its core it seems simple enough: a piece of text associated with a point in time for a particular track. So when Johannes Wagener told me he was adding an  event to our JS SDK, I immediately began work on Wave Raid: Quest for the Timed Comment.
